metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1524-1 -- Recommended update for kernel-firmware
metadata.description:
This update for kernel-firmware provides the following enhancements:
* Add the new Intel Wilkins Peak BT firmwares (version 2e) * Update rtl_nic/rtl8168e-3.fw to its current version and add rtl8168f-{1, 2}.fw * Add firmware for Realtek RTL8188EE * Remove duplicated sb16/* and yamaha/* firmware files that conflict with alsa-firmware package * Add firmware files for Wilkins Peak 1/2 WiFi (FATE#313607) * Update ar3k firmwares to v20130729 to fix loading errors.

extend_definition.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11.x is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 11.x is installed
